lecho.lib.hellocharts.model

Class PieChartData

  • java.lang.Object
    • lecho.lib.hellocharts.model.AbstractChartData
      • lecho.lib.hellocharts.model.PieChartData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChartData

    public class PieChartData
extends AbstractChartData
    Data for PieChart, by default it doesn't have axes.

      • setHasLabelsOnlyForSelected

        public PieChartData setHasLabelsOnlyForSelected(boolean hasLabelsOnlyForSelected)
        Set true if you want to show value labels only for selected value, works best when chart has isValueSelectionEnabled set to true Chart.setValueSelectionEnabled(boolean).

      • hasLabelsOutside

        public boolean hasLabelsOutside()

      • setHasLabelsOutside

        public void setHasLabelsOutside(boolean hasLabelsOutside)
        Set if labels should be drawn inside circle(false) or outside(true). By default false. If you set it to true you should also change chart fill ration using PieChartView.setCircleFillRatio(float). This flag is used only if you also set hasLabels or hasLabelsOnlyForSelected flags.
